title: Looking for a silver junlge/mid or top
body: Hey! just looking for someone with experience in the lanes i put in the tittle would like to duo and since i can not find people as the public chat in that game is gone i came here just add me "chucknouriish" if you want in... please have a brain i main {{champion:80}}  {{champion:55}} {{champion:1}}  and {{champion:10}}

replies.body: because you put everyone else down and then said how you like to play champs that require little brain to use effectively... basically contradicting your own requirements.
